verses.verse: In the <S%G1161%G3796>end<s%> of the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>, as it began to <S%G2020>dawn<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> to <S%G2334>see<s%> the <S%G5028>sepulchre<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, and <S%G4334>came<s%> and rolled <S%G617>back<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1883>upon<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%><S%G846>His<s%> <S%G2397>countenance<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G796>lightning<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1742>raiment<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G5510>snow<s%>:
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G5083>keepers<s%> did <S%G4579>shake<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> men.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto the <S%G1135>women<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified<s%>.

He <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>. <S%G1205>Come<s%>, <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2749>lay<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, and <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, he goeth <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>; <S%G1563>there<s%> shall ye <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2400>lo<s%>, I have <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulchre<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>; and did <S%G5143>run<s%> to <S%G518>bring<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G518>word<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they <S%G4198>went<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101%G2532>disciples<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, All hail <S%G5463><s%> . <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2902>held<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> by the <S%G4228>feet<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Be <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%> : go <S%G565><s%> tell <S%G518><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> , and there <S%G2546><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> .

¶ <S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4198>going<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2892>watch<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, and <S%G518>shewed<s%> unto the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> all the <S%G537>things<s%> that were <S%G1096>done<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they were <S%G4863>assembled<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%>, they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2425>large<s%> <S%G694>money<s%> unto the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, Say <S%G2036%G3754>ye<s%>, <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, and <S%G2813>stole<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> away while <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G2837>slept<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G191>come<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2232>governor's<s%> <S%G191>ears<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> will <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G275%G4160>secure<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

<S%G1161>So<s%> they <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G694>money<s%>, and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they were <S%G1321>taught<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> is commonly <S%G1310>reported<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> went <S%G4198>away<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5021>appointed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> some <S%G1365>doubted<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> .

¶ Go ye <S%G4198><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> , and teach <S%G3100><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> , baptizing <S%G907><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> :

Teaching <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to observe <S%G5083><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> I have commanded <S%G1781><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> , lo <S%G2400><s%> , I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> alway <S%G3956%G2250><s%> , even unto <S%G2193><s%> the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%> . <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
